data.sentence:
buatkan query replace untuk tabel berikut CREATE TABLE karyawan (
  idkaryawan INT(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  nik VARCHAR(15) NULL DEFAULT NULL COMMENT 'NIK' COLLATE 'utf8_general_ci',
  namakaryawan VARCHAR(50) NULL DEFAULT NULL COMMENT 'NAMA KARYAWAN' COLLATE 'utf8_general_ci',
  jabatan VARCHAR(30) NULL DEFAULT NULL COMMENT 'JABATAN' COLLATE 'utf8_general_ci',
  area VARCHAR(15) NULL DEFAULT NULL COMMENT 'AREA' COLLATE 'utf8_general_ci',
  foto LONGBLOB NULL DEFAULT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (idkaryawan) USING BTREE
)
COLLATE='utf8_general_ci'
ENGINE=InnoDB
ROW_FORMAT=COMPACT
AUTO_INCREMENT=4308
;
